text:

[Student]: In the bustling city of Binaryville lived two best friends named Alpha and Beta who loved exploring their world
[Teacher]: and all its wonders. They lived in a cozy little house on a quiet street, surrounded by tall buildings and neon lights that never seemed to dim. One day, Alpha decided to invite Beta to a secret location deep in the heart of the city,
[Student]: known for its vast open spaces like the Cube Mountains
[Teacher]: . This place was unlike any other in Binaryville, with its vast grasslands and towering peaks that seemed to touch the sky. As they arrived at the Cube Mountains, they saw that they were not alone. A group of creatures unlike any they had
[Student]: ever seen before
[Teacher]: roamed the open spaces. These creatures were tall, slender beings with skin like polished marble and hair that flowed like the wind. They had eyes that shone like the brightest stars, and they seemed to be made of the very essence of the stars
